eng_after: of the posts and their bands
and the LORD will be angry
of the one to be cleansed,
of the one to be cleansed,
and a large jar [in the other],
the web of a loom [and fasten it with a pin, I will become as weak as any other man.]”
and I will become as weak

eng_before: And having lulled him to sleep
But when they got up early
for him to regain the favor
And when he cut the hair
And when he cut the hair
with his company of fifty men.
